actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend article 52 of the Uniform Code of Military Justice to require the concurrence of all members of a court-martial to convict any person of violating a punitive article under such code.

summary.text: Requires the concurrence of all members of a court-martial to convict any person of violating a punitive article under the Uniform Code of Military Justice. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 852a)

titles.title: A bill to amend article 52 of the Uniform Code of Military Justice to require the concurrence of all members of a court-martial to convict any person of violating a punitive article under such code.
